The legendary expansion that DEFINITELY doesn't infringe on anyone's intellectual property! 😉 Contains the most iconic tabletop species ever printed — the same archetypes that made you fall in love with rolling dice and pretending to be someone cooler than yourself! Each booster guarantees 2 rare pulls, 2 uncommons, and 2 commons — perfect for building your "totally not D&D" campaign! 🎴

💎 Pack Contents: 6 randomized cards from the ultimate tabletop collection:

- Devilish Tieflings (Infernal outcasts with hearts of gold!) 😈
- Mighty Dragonborn (Breath weapons included!) 🐲
- Elemental Genasi (Fire, water, earth, air mastery!) 🌪️
- Astral Githyanki (Silver sword space pirates!) ⚔️
- Mimicking Kenku (Perfect voice thieves!) 🦅
- Crafty Kobolds (Candle-obsessed trap makers!) 🕯️

🏆 Chase Cards:
Karlach — the infernal engine with a heart (★★★★☆) • Mythic Githyanki Warrior (★★★★⯪) • Secret Rare Fire Genasi (★★★⯪☆)
✨ Premium Nostalgia Features:

All cards feature exclusive BunnyCo artwork with signature foil patterns!
Each species showcases the tabletop archetypes that sparked countless campaigns!
Remember your first Tiefling warlock? Your first Dragonborn paladin? They're all here in gorgeous holographic glory! ✨
Every card captures that magical "I rolled a nat 20!" feeling! 💫

🎯 Campaign Ready: Perfect for any fantasy setting that's DEFINITELY not based on a certain trademarked game system! These time-tested archetypes have been making adventures memorable since dice were invented!
BunnyCo Legal Disclaimer: All resemblance to existing intellectual property is purely coincidental and covered under the "we're literally a bunch of rabbits in a trench coat you can't sue us." clause! 🐰💕

Everything you need to start your TOTALLY ORIGINAL tabletop collection! 🚀

2.content:
🃏 TIEFLING CARD
★★⯪☆☆ | Infernal/Arcane

[🏅] SIGNATURE CARD: Karlach — the infernal engine with a heart
"I'm done apologizing for surviving hell; now I'm here to live."

[🧬 BIOLOGY]
- Lifespan: 80-120 years; adults by 18; elders retain vigor into 90s.
- Body: 5'5"-6'2"; dense horn keratin; many have 3-5 ft prehensile tails; skin ranges coal-ash to crimson-indigo; eyes may be gold, white, or black.
- Senses: short-range darkvision; normal color discrimination otherwise.
- Diet & Metabolism: omnivorous with high spice tolerance; heat-stable blood variants.
- Thermoregulation: above-average heat tolerance; cold affects like humans.
- Healing: comparable to humans; some lines resist heat scarring.
- Reproduction: viviparous; 9-10 month gestation; inter-fertile with humans; traits express polygenically.
- Aging: horn ridges thicken; tail dexterity matures by age 5; hair grays or gilds.
- Habitat: urban enclaves, infernal-touched regions, anywhere they can find acceptance.

[💘 REPRODUCTION & SEX]
- Baseline: moderate fertility with human-compatible breeding; some infernal bloodlines have seasonal heat spikes; tiefling traits can skip generations.
- Courtship: spiced gift exchanges, magical heritage displays, tail positioning signals; family approval often required due to stigma.
- Mechanics: males have human-standard cocks with elevated body temperature; sex tends to be passionate with higher stamina; tail play during intimacy is sensitive and common.
- Arousal: both sexes flush noticeably; males maintain erections longer; females lubricate well; horn bases are erogenous zones.
- Fluids: males produce warm, thick cum; females respond with elevated heat and wetness.
- Aftercare: spiced wine, mutual grooming around horns/tails, temperature regulation with warm baths.

[🔥 INFERNAL HERITAGE]
- Ancestral devil pacts influence horn shape, eye glow, and minor magical quirks; resistance to fire common but not absolute.

[⚡ SPECIAL MOVES]
- Hellish Rebuke (pain into fire); Devil's Tongue (supernatural persuasion); Legacy Sparks (family cantrips).

[🏛️ DIASPORA SOCIETY]
- Urban enclaves with sigil-warded homes; color festivals reclaim stigma; negotiate sanctuary with tolerant temples.

[⚠️ WEAKNESSES]
- Sanctified places cause discomfort; social prejudice creates isolation; true-name bindings may have power.

[⛓️ COUNTERS]
- Use consecrated ground for advantage, exploit prejudice to isolate, remember heat tolerance isn't fire immunity.

[✨] FOIL_PATTERN
- Black-red marbling with ember runes that flare when tilted.

3.content:
🃏 DRAGONBORN CARD
★★⯪☆☆ | War/Elemental

[🏅] SIGNATURE CARD: Arkhan the Cruel — dragonborn warlord
"Strength to the scaled; glory paid in conquest."

[🧬 BIOLOGY]
- Lifespan: 70-90 years; rapid adolescence; peak by 20.
- Body: 6'0"-7'0"; 220-320 lb; thick dermal scales; cranial crests and heat-dump frills vary by ancestry.
- Senses: keen scent and battlefield awareness; darkvision varies by setting.
- Diet & Metabolism: protein-heavy omnivores; caloric needs spike during seasonal molts.
- Thermoregulation: prefer warm/dry climates; layered scales provide cold tolerance.
- Healing: rapid clotting; scale plates regrow over months; resistance mirrors ancestry element.
- Reproduction: oviparous; 1-3 eggs; 60-80 day incubation; hatchlings emerge scaled and mobile.
- Aging: scale color deepens; crest plates thicken in elders.
- Habitat: clan strongholds, ancestral territories, anywhere draconic heritage is honored.

[💘 REPRODUCTION & SEX]
- Baseline: oviparous with small clutches; fertility tied to clan strength; crossbreeding rare and setting-dependent.
- Courtship: ritual combat displays, territory claiming, ancestral gift exchanges; dominance determines mating rights; consent through combat victory traditional.
- Mechanics: males have retractable 6-8 inch cocks with draconic ridges; females have muscular cunts built for large eggs; sex is intense with biting, clawing, breath-play.
- Arousal: males emerge from sheaths with visible ridging; both run extremely hot; breath weapons can trigger during climax.
- Fluids: males produce thick, warm loads; females self-lubricate heavily with elevated temperature.
- Aftercare: heat sharing, mutual scale grooming, territorial marking; eggs require both parents for temperature.

[🔥 BREATH DISCIPLINE]
- Cone or line exhalations mirror ancestry element; fighters treat breath like kata with visible wind-up cues.

[⚡ SPECIAL MOVES]
- Drake's Resilience (elemental skin); Battle Roar (ally coordination); Ancestral Fury (heritage power spike).

[🏛️ CLAN LAW]
- Oaths and duels formalize honor; armor uses ancestry motifs as battlefield signals.

[⚠️ WEAKNESSES]
- Exposed frills and vents vulnerable after breath use; opposing elements cause extra damage.

[⛓️ COUNTERS]
- Blunt breath with terrain counters, bait exhale off visible tells, target frills and vents, use opposing elements.

[↔️ DIFFERENTIATION — LIZARDFOLK vs DRAGONBORN vs KOBOLD]

- Lizardfolk are ectothermic swamp-dwellers with egg-laying and no breath weapons; Dragonborn are warm-blooded with draconic ancestry and elemental breath; Kobolds are small trap-crafting tunnel-dwellers with darkvision and candle obsessions.

[✨] FOIL_PATTERN
- Deep metallic sheen that shifts with ancestry hues.

4.content:
🃏 GENASI CARD
★★★☆☆ | Elemental/Planar

[🏅] SIGNATURE CARD: Iconic Fire Genasi — ember-wreathed archetype
"The world is a kiln and I am its artisan."

[🧬 BIOLOGY]
- Lifespan: 90-120 years; human-like maturation; elemental traits intensify in adolescence.
- Body: human baseline with element micro-traits (fire-elevated temp, water-webbing, earth-dense bone, air-lower heart rate).
- Senses: element-tuned perception like tremor-feel, pressure-hearing, rain-smell by lineage.
- Diet & Metabolism: normal diets; element cravings (char, brine, mineral salt, rare airs).
- Thermoregulation: comfort bands shift toward native element environments.
- Healing: humanoid baseline; some develop element-patterned scarring.
- Reproduction: inter-fertile with humans; offspring may express different elements than parents.
- Habitat: element-specific environments - fire favors magma, water coasts, earth caverns, air cliffs.

[💘 REPRODUCTION & SEX]
- Baseline: moderate fertility with element-influenced cycles; fire heats during arousal, water becomes fluid, earth shows stamina, air gains sensitivity.
- Courtship: elemental power displays, environmental compatibility tests, element-specific experiences; partners handle temperature/pressure differences.
- Mechanics: anatomy standard but element-influenced - fire runs hot, water self-lubricates more, earth has endurance, air hypersensitive; environmental preferences matter.
- Arousal: elemental traits intensify - fire flushes/warms, water becomes slick, earth shows stamina, air hypersensitive; partners need element-compatible prep.
- Fluids: males produce element-influenced cum (warm, cool, thick, light); females show elemental arousal patterns.
- Aftercare: element-specific needs - fire wants cooling, water needs drying, earth craves pressure, air requires breezes.

[🌊 ELEMENTAL AFFINITY]
- Markers in hair, skin, breath - ember-freckles, seafoam hair, granite veining, whisper-quiet steps.

[⚡ SPECIAL MOVES]
- Elemental Surge (overclock in native medium); Planar Breath (function in hostile substances); Attunement (touch-range shaping).

[⚠️ WEAKNESSES]
- Opposed elements cause discomfort and dulled abilities; leaving comfort zones reduces control.

[⛓️ COUNTERS]
- Push into opposed conditions, strike during Surge wind-up, mix mediums like steam to split focus.

[✨] FOIL_PATTERN
- Prismatic grain flipping between flame, wave, stone, cloud.

5.content:
🃏 GITHYANKI CARD
★★★★☆ | Psionic/Planar

[🏅] SIGNATURE CARD: Lae'zel — blade-first githyanki
"Steel first, doubt never."

[🧬 BIOLOGY]
- Lifespan: 130-170 years; extended midlife resilience.
- Body: 6'0"-6'6"; lean, tensile muscle adapted for low-gravity maneuvering; pallor and star-adapted eyes.
- Senses: trained psionic timing; strong vestibular control from astral drills.
- Diet & Metabolism: sparse diets suffice during astral sorties; electrolyte rations common.
- Healing: humanoid baseline; psionic meditation reduces downtime.
- Reproduction: viviparous with low birth rates; aptitude testing occurs early in creches.
- Sleep: standard plus trance compressions to conserve campaign time.
- Habitat: astral strongholds, planar citadels, anywhere the fight against mind flayers continues.

[💘 REPRODUCTION & SEX]
- Baseline: low fertility with creche-controlled breeding; pairings based on psionic compatibility and combat prowess; offspring tested early for silver sword aptitude.
- Courtship: sparring matches, psionic demonstrations, raid trophy exchanges; consent through martial superiority; creche approval required for breeding rights.
- Mechanics: males have standard cocks; sex is disciplined and efficient with focus on genetic optimization; psionic feedback during climax creates shared sensations.
- Arousal: both sexes maintain combat readiness; males get firm quickly; females lubricate efficiently; psionic arousal creates mental links.
- Fluids: males produce measured loads; females respond predictably with adequate lubrication.
- Aftercare: weapon maintenance, tactical debriefing, preparing for next astral sortie; emotional bonds serve creche loyalty.

[🗡️ SILVER SWORD MASTERY]
- Silver swords cut flesh and astral seams; threatening both body and spirit; mark of true githyanki warriors.

[🧠 PSIONIC ABILITIES]
- Telekinesis, Kinetic Cut (telekinetic edge), Ward Shove (pressure wave); trained from birth in creches.

[⚡ SPECIAL MOVES]
- Astral Step (planar movement); Silver Strike (spirit-cutting blade); Psi-Storm (mental assault).

[🏛️ CRECHE DISCIPLINE]
- Regimented upbringing breeds warriors; rank through combat; scars and trophies as resumes.

[⚠️ WEAKNESSES]

[⛓️ COUNTERS]

[✨] FOIL_PATTERN
- Starfield holo with thin silver sword etchings.

6.content:
🃏 KENKU CARD
★★★☆☆ | Shadow/Trickery

[🏅] SIGNATURE CARD: Kiri — the quick-learning kenku
"Kiri listened, learned, and now the city speaks back."

[🧬 BIOLOGY]
- Lifespan: 60-90 years; adulthood by 12-14.
- Body: 4'6"-5'0"; hollow-bone lightness; powerful legs; vestigial wings with limited glide.
- Senses: acute eyesight; rapid auditory parsing; beaks have fine tactile sensitivity.
- Diet & Metabolism: omnivorous scavengers preferring nuts, seeds, small game, urban leftovers.
- Healing: humanoid baseline; seasonal feather molts affect thermals.
- Reproduction: oviparous; 1-2 eggs; 50-60 day incubation; fledging by 8-10 years.
- Sleep: light sleepers; prefer high perches and rooftops for safety.
- Habitat: urban environments, high places, anywhere they can observe and mimic.

[💘 REPRODUCTION & SEX]
- Baseline: low fertility with careful nest site selection; strong pair bonding during breeding season; males perform elaborate mimicry displays.
- Courtship: complex vocal performances mimicking partner's favorite sounds; nest building competitions; gift exchanges of shiny objects.
- Mechanics: males have small 3-4 inch cocks; females have standard avian anatomy; sex is gentle with lots of preening and vocal play; prefer elevated locations.
- Arousal: both sexes vocalize with mimicked sounds of pleasure; males display proudly; females respond with soft chirping calls.
- Fluids: males produce small loads; females lubricate adequately for their size.
- Aftercare: mutual preening, sharing collected treasures, practicing new sounds together; sleeping curled in high, safe places.

[🎭 PERFECT MIMICRY]
- Syrinx and palate replay any sound with uncanny fidelity; accents, keys, timbres copied not invented.

[🪶 GLIDE CAPABILITY]
- Flightless wings permit short glides; hands and feet handle precise tool work and locks.

[⚡ SPECIAL MOVES]
- Throw Voice (project remembered voice); Echo Lure (familiar calls); Sound Mask (ambient noise camouflage).

[🏙️ URBAN ADAPTATION]
- Rooftop communities; shiny object currencies; sound archives as cultural memory.

[⚠️ WEAKNESSES]
- Cannot create original speech easily; bright lights eliminate perch advantages; silence kills mimicry.

[⛓️ COUNTERS]
- Kill mimicry with silence, fight in open light, force problems with no reference to copy.

[↔️ DIFFERENTIATION — BIRDFOLK vs KENKU vs TENGU]

- Birdfolk are living people with limited flight and normal speech; Kenku are cursed corvids with perfect mimicry but no original speech; Tengu are mountain wind-spirits with martial discipline and sword mastery.

[✨] FOIL_PATTERN
- Matte black with iridescent feather flashes and hidden musical notes.

7.content:
🃏 KOBOLD CARD
★★⯪☆☆ | Cunning/Underground

[🏅] SIGNATURE CARD: Kobold Sapper — candle-bright tunnel terror
"Shiny safe, tunnel safe, tribe safe."

[🧬 BIOLOGY]
- Lifespan: 45-65 years; adulthood around 8-10; high early mortality in wild warrens.
- Body: 2'6"-3'6"; 25-40 lb; dense small scales; long tail for balance and signaling.
- Senses: darkvision with sun-glare sensitivity; strong olfaction for underground navigation.
- Diet & Metabolism: efficient omnivores with insect protein; low water needs in humid environments.
- Thermoregulation: heat-friendly; tolerate mine heat through vented burrow networks.
- Healing: fast clotting; thin skin scars easily; scar maps used as identity markers.
- Reproduction: oviparous; clutches 2-6; 40-60 day incubation; rapid juvenile maturation.
- Sleep: polyphasic naps when unsafe; communal nest piles when secure.
- Habitat: underground warrens, mine networks, trap-filled tunnel complexes.

[💘 REPRODUCTION & SEX]
- Baseline: high fertility with large clutches; communal breeding during safe seasons; warren elders control mating rights.
- Courtship: trap-crafting competitions, shiny gift exchanges, tunnel expansion projects; successful miners earn breeding privileges.
- Mechanics: males have proportional 2-3 inch cocks; females lay eggs requiring communal incubation; sex is quick and practical in warm burrow chambers.
- Arousal: both sexes signal readiness through tail positions and scent marking; males become more territorial; females prepare nesting sites.
- Fluids: males produce small efficient loads for fertilization; females prepare for egg-laying cycles.
- Aftercare: communal nest building, sharing food stores, protecting eggs together; tribe survival over individual pleasure.

[🕯️ TRAPCRAFT MASTERY]
- Burrow architecture with vents, strings, slide-stones; mines are living machines of defense.

[💎 HOARD INSTINCT]
- Collect shiny objects as status and currency; candle-making and wax work for light and bombs.

[⚡ SPECIAL MOVES]
- Swarm Tactics (tunnel death funnels); Candle Bombs (wax-pitch explosives); Tunnel Collapse (keystone drops).

[⚠️ WEAKNESSES]
- Sunlight sensitivity; small size limits individual strength; warren dependency.

[⛓️ COUNTERS]
- Drag fights to open ground, smoke tunnels to reveal vents, cut signal chains before warren wakes.


[↔️ DIFFERENTIATION — LIZARDFOLK vs DRAGONBORN vs KOBOLD]

- Lizardfolk are ectothermic swamp-dwellers with egg-laying and no breath weapons; Dragonborn are warm-blooded with draconic ancestry and elemental breath; Kobolds are small trap-crafting tunnel-dwellers with darkvision and candle obsessions.

[✨] FOIL_PATTERN
- Warm waxy sheen with tiny flickering lights under surface.

9.content:
🃏 VAMPIRE CARD
★★★★⯪ | Night/Charm

[🏅] SIGNATURE CARD: Alucard — nightlord of monster hunts
"Show me your resolve; the night will measure it."

[🧬 BIOLOGY]
- More a state of being than an official race. Is typically paired with another primary race. (What they were before death.)
- Lifespan: indefinite barring destruction; appearance preserved at turning age.
- Body: no pulse or body heat; minimal respiration; strength scales with blood reserves; extendable canines.
- Senses: superior night vision; keen hearing; blood scent carries across rooms.
- Diet & Metabolism: blood mandatory; mortal food inert or nauseating unless setting allows.
- Healing: rapid regeneration fails under sunlight, holy saturation, or sustained fire.
- Reproduction: turning setting-dependent; biological offspring atypical and explicitly gated.
- Sleep: day rest compulsion in coffin or native soil depending on tradition.
- Habitat: gothic manors, urban penthouses, anywhere they can control light and access.

[💘 REPRODUCTION & SEX]
- Baseline: sex and feeding often intertwine; arousal increases blood flow and taste; orgasm spikes yield for feeding.
- Courtship: seductive charm building over time; repeated small feedings create will-binding; gifts of rare blood types or vintage wines.
- Mechanics: cool skin contrasts with warm breath; males have standard cocks but no body heat; sex often involves biting during climax; short repeated sips safer than long drains.
- Arousal: feeding and arousal feedback loop; kissing turns to biting; partners become euphoric from gentle feeding.
- Fluids: males produce cool cum; feeding during sex creates intense shared pleasure.
- Aftercare: blood sharing aftermath leaves partners drowsy and flushed; avoid overdraw causing chills and fatigue; fluids, salt, iron-rich food for recovery.

[🩸 FEEDING MECHANICS]
- Repeated feedings bind will and habit; influence grows from social to occult; common bite sites: neck, wrist, inner arm, thigh.

[🌙 NOCTURNAL NATURE]
- Night is native state; even day-tolerant strains feel compulsion to sleep by day.

[⚡ SPECIAL MOVES]
- Glamour (supernatural persuasion); Mist Form (escape not combat); Blood Rush (trade future hunger for speed).

[⚠️ UNHEALTHY PATTERNS]
- Feeding creates addiction and dependency in victims; charm abilities undermine true consent; power imbalances inherent to vampire-mortal relationships.

[⚠️ WEAKNESSES]
- Sunlight causes damage; running water barriers; invitation rules; holy symbols gain power if culturally significant.

[⛓️ COUNTERS]
- Define sunlight/invitation rules consistently, stake to pin and finish by chosen rite (burning/sanctification).

[✨] FOIL_PATTERN
- Velvet black with blood red drip that pools and recedes.

10.content:
🃏 WEREWOLF CARD
★★★⯪☆ | Feral/Curse

[🏅] SIGNATURE CARD: Remus Lupin — scholar wrestling the beast
"Fear the monster, yes; fear surrender more."

[🧬 BIOLOGY]
- Lifespan: human baseline extended by curse vigor; vitality spikes around full moons.
- Body: hybrid shifts produce digitigrade stride, elongated forelimbs, hypertrophic claws/fangs; thick hair growth.
- Senses: hyper-keen smell and hearing; scent memory allows tracking for days.
- Diet & Metabolism: carnivorous cravings surge near lunar peaks; extreme caloric needs during/after shifts.
- Healing: rapid tissue knitting; silver and fire disrupt healing and scar permanently.
- Reproduction: hereditary lines exist; bite-transmission common and culturally policed by packs.
- Sleep: irregular around lunar cycle; heavy crashes after transformations.
- Habitat: pack territories near wilderness, safe houses in towns for dangerous nights.

[💘 REPRODUCTION & SEX]
- Baseline: enhanced fertility during moon cycles; both sexes experience heightened drive near full moons; pack breeding carefully managed.
- Courtship: scent marking, dominance displays, pack hunt participation; consent through pack hierarchy and moon-cycle timing.
- Mechanics: human form sex is standard; hybrid form features canid-style knot during climax creating 5-20 minute tie until swelling eases; rough play common.
- Arousal: males develop prominent knots when aroused; females enter heat cycles with stronger scent and lubrication; both become more aggressive and possessive.
- Fluids: males produce large knotted loads during tie; females respond with increased wetness and scent production.
- Aftercare: mutual grooming, shared meat, pack bonding; injuries from rough play heal quickly; avoid silver contact during intimate moments.

[🌕 LUNAR INFLUENCE]
- Full moons widen trigger windows; bloodlines learn control rituals; young ones ride the storm without restraint.

[🥈 SILVER VULNERABILITY]
- Silver burns, sterilizes wounds, slows healing; branded scars map werewolf's history of control failures.

[⚡ SPECIAL MOVES]
- Moon Frenzy (lunar overdrive); Pack Pounce (coordinated assault); Hunter's Nose (scent tracking).

[⚠️ UNHEALTHY PATTERNS]
- Pack hierarchy enforces breeding rights through dominance; loss of control during moons can lead to non-consensual encounters; territorial aggression over mates.

[⚠️ WEAKNESSES]
- Silver contact burns and prevents healing; loss of control during full moons; pack dependency.

[⛓️ COUNTERS]
- Carry silver for contact, fight on waning nights with wind control, break scent lines to reset tracking.

↔️ DIFFERENTIATION — WOLFFOLK vs WEREWOLF]

- Wolffolk are a born people (65-75% human) with steady biology year-round and no curse; Werewolves are moon-cursed shapeshifters with silver weakness and cycle-driven power spikes.

[✨] FOIL_PATTERN
- Silver-gray with claw-scratch slashes that shimmer.

11.content:
🃏 ZOMBIE CARD
★★⯪☆☆ | Plague/Horde

[🏅] SIGNATURE CARD: T-Virus Shambler — survival horror archetype
"It remembers nothing but the hunger."

[🧬 BIOLOGY]
- Lifespan: days to years depending on decay rate, climate, animating vector.
- Body: ataxic gait and degraded coordination; grasp-and-bite reflex loops dominate behavior.
- Senses: dull sight and smell but persistent; loud sounds magnetize the horde.
- Diet & Metabolism: no true metabolism; consumption is compulsion not nutrition.
- Reproduction: transmission via bites, fluids, necromancer signals, or spore blooms (setting-dependent).
- Sleep: no biological sleep; horde grows still when unstimulated.
- Habitat: wherever the outbreak spreads - cities, towns, anywhere humans once lived.

[💘 REPRODUCTION & SEX]
- Baseline: no sexual drive or reproductive function; undead state eliminates biological urges entirely.
- Mechanics: genitals non-functional; no arousal or sexual response; any physical contact is purely aggressive feeding behavior.
- Transmission: spreading plague through bites and fluid contact replaces reproductive drive; creates more zombies not offspring.
- Aftercare: none applicable; zombies do not form bonds or provide care.

[🧟‍♂️ HORDE BEHAVIOR]
- Attracted by sound and movement; wash around obstacles like slow water; numbers create unstoppable force.

[🦠 TRANSMISSION VECTORS]
- Bites, contaminated fluids, necromantic animation, viral/bacterial agents - choose vector and maintain consistency.

[⚡ SPECIAL MOVES]

[⚠️ WEAKNESSES]

[✨] FOIL_PATTERN

- Junk tech and opportunist engineering; warboss ladders maintain direction; ambush specialists.

[🌙 PACK TACTICS]
- Surge bravely in groups, vanish when alone; 24-hour activity through shift sleeping.

[⚡ SPECIAL MOVES]
- Pack Ambush (numbers into inevitability); Scrap Bombs (unreliable explosives); Net-and-Spear (restraint first).

[⚠️ WEAKNESSES]
- Individual cowardice without pack support; poor hygiene leads to disease; limited intelligence.

[⛓️ COUNTERS]
- Move off-beat to ruin pre-sighted traps, target leaders to collapse hierarchy, blind darkvision with flares.

[✨] FOIL_PATTERN
- Sickly green with darting gold motes like greedy eyes.

13.content:
🃏 LICH CARD
★★★★⯪ | Arcane/Necromancy

[🏅] SIGNATURE CARD: Ainz Ooal Gown — overlord treating worlds like chessboards
"A plan that requires luck failed on paper."

[🧬 BIOLOGY]
- Lifespan: effectively eternal while phylactery endures; bodies are replaceable shells.
- Body: desiccated remains animated by arcane force; organs vestigial and non-functional.
- Senses: arcane perception and soul-sight eclipse dulled mundane senses.
- Diet & Metabolism: none; sustenance drawn from magical sources or soul energy.
- Reproduction: created via ritual; no biological reproduction; may groom apprentice successors.
- Sleep: no sleep; operates in long study trances synchronized to ward cycles.
- Habitat: heavily warded towers, necropolis cities, planar strongholds beyond mortal reach.

LICH [💘 REPRODUCTION & SEX]:
- Baseline: no biological reproduction but strong psychological need for domination and control through sex; magical animation maintains genital function; partners become test subjects for magical experimentation.
- Courtship: displays of arcane power, offering forbidden knowledge, magical gifts that create dependency; consent obtained through magical compulsion, blackmail, or genuine fascination with power.
- Mechanics: magically animated genitals function normally; males maintain erections through necromantic energy; sex involves magical domination, mind control experiments, pain/pleasure manipulation through spells; prefers positions that demonstrate absolute control.
- Arousal: powered by dominance and intellectual superiority rather than physical sensation; males get hard from exerting control; magical feedback creates intense but alien pleasure responses.
- Fluids: males produce magically-charged cum that may have alchemical properties; magical lubrication for females if body permits.
- Aftercare: none provided to partners; may study partner's responses, take notes, or dismiss them entirely; views sex as research data collection.
[📜 PHYLACTERY MASTERY]
- Soul anchored to vessel - coin, gem, page, city gate; body is replaceable mask.

[🏰 LAIR DEFENSES]
- Wards layer like onion; puzzle locks misdirect; minions route intruders into harvesting corridors.

[⚡ SPECIAL MOVES]
- Soul Anchor (redirect killing blows); Time Ward (scripted contingencies); Death Command (simultaneous cohort orders).

[🧙‍♂️ ARCANE SUPREMACY]
- Centuries of magical study; reality-altering spells; necromantic armies; planar manipulation.

[⚠️ WEAKNESSES]
- Phylactery dependency; overconfidence from immortality; predictable logical patterns.

[⛓️ COUNTERS]
- Find phylactery to define victory, assume layered contingencies, overrun with radiant to compress reform windows.

[✨] FOIL_PATTERN
- Cold blue-black with runic circuits; sixth star gleams like soul-gem.

14.content:
🃏 GHOST CARD
★★★☆☆ | Spirit/Haunt

[🏅] SIGNATURE CARD: Casper — friend-shaped spirit
"I only wanted a friend; is that so frightening?"

[🧬 BIOLOGY]
- More a state of being than an official race. Is typically paired with another primary race. (What they were before death.)
- Lifespan: persists until anchor resolves or energy dissipates; strength varies with memory attention.
- Body: non-corporeal presence that chills air and disrupts instruments; ectoplasmic traces linger.
- Senses: sees through emotion and memory layers; may be selective in who perceives it.
- Diet & Metabolism: none; attention, grief, or unfulfilled vows act as fuel.
- Reproduction: none; new ghosts arise when deaths occur under binding circumstances.
- Sleep: thins by daylight or during anchor's weakest hour.
- Habitat: locations tied to their anchoring trauma, memory, or unfulfilled purpose.

[💘 REPRODUCTION & SEX]
- Baseline: intense longing for physical intimacy they cannot fully achieve; sexual desires often what anchors them to mortal plane; desperate for touch and connection.
- Courtship: appearing in dreams, moving objects suggestively, creating cold spots during intimate moments; consent varies wildly - some seek permission, others take what they need.
- Mechanics: brief possession allows limited physical sensation; psychic connections during partner's masturbation or sex; poltergeist activity as sexual expression - moving hands, creating pressure, temperature play.
- Arousal: feeds off partner's sexual energy; manifestation becomes stronger during arousal; may accidentally break objects or cause electrical surges during intense moments.
- Fluids: cannot produce physical fluids but may create ectoplasmic residue during intense manifestations; draws energy from partner's orgasms.
- Aftercare: desperate clinging to the experience; may follow partner afterward; sharing warmth through supernatural means; often leaves partner drained but emotionally connected.

[👻 MANIFESTATION]
- Poltergeist surges throw objects; brief possessions imprint emotions; veil drifts pass doors but snag on wards.

[🔗 ANCHORING]
- Tied to intimate objects (rings) or wide areas (battlefields); triggers include hours, names, family lines.

[⚡ SPECIAL MOVES]
- Possession (short emotional rides); Polter Surge (sudden but shallow); Veil Drift (movement without mass).

[🕯️ RESOLUTION]
- Closure through completed promises, spoken names, or repaid debts; decide lever before encounter.

[⚠️ WEAKNESSES]
- Bound to specific locations or objects; weakens in daylight; requires emotional fuel to manifest.

[⛓️ COUNTERS]
- Name the anchor and work release lever - vow, forgiveness, rite - under consistent banishing practice.

[✨] FOIL_PATTERN
- Milky opal that blooms and ebbs like inner candle.

16.content:
🃏 DULLAHAN CARD
★★★★⯪ | Omen/Rider

[🏅] SIGNATURE CARD: Celty Sturluson — urban legend on a bike
“Head or no head, I still know where I’m going.”

[🧬 BIOLOGY]
- Unlife Span: Endures as long as the road-oath holds and the names remain to be called.
- Form: A decapitated body directed by a detached head; the head sees and speaks while the body acts.
- Senses: The head peers through darkness and hears true names on the wind according to legend.
- Metabolism: None in mortal terms. Can eat and drink. Just... Don't question it.
- Reproduction: None; created by curses or decrees of the fair folk.
- Sleep:  [SETTING SPECIFICATIONS]

DULLAHAN [💘 REPRODUCTION & SEX]:

- Baseline: normal human sexual function despite head separation; body responds to arousal independently while head provides direction and communication.
- Courtship: head courts verbally while body demonstrates through actions; unique dynamic where head may be in different room during intimate conversations; offering rides on spectral mount.
- Mechanics: head must be positioned for communication during sex; body responds to sexual stimuli normally; males have standard cocks, females standard anatomy; coordination between head and body creates interesting logistics; head often held or positioned nearby.
- Arousal: body shows normal physical responses while head provides verbal feedback; creates unique dynamic where expressions of pleasure are separate from physical response; both parts must be satisfied.
- Fluids: normal human-level production and response; head may not taste or feel fluids directly.
- Aftercare: head rejoins body for cuddling; sharing food or drink (if head can consume); comparing notes between head's experience and body's sensations; often involves problem-solving the logistics for next time.
[📣 NAME HARVEST]
- The head calls the true name and the body collects the due; once named, the path narrows to a single meeting.

[🐎 SPECTRAL MOUNT]
- The steed ignores mundane obstacles—hedges, walls, and streams break like fog beneath its hooves. A steed can be anything from a horse, to a motercycle.

[🕯️ LANTERN OF SOULS]
- Lantern-light does not blind; it reveals fated faces even through masks and helm.

[🪙 GOLD WARD]
- Gold bands sting; roads sown with coins force the rider to swerve or slow, never to yield entirely.

[⚡ SPECIAL MOVES]
- Headsman’s Arc is a single, perfect line; Night Gallop folds distance like cloth; Name Call seals fate within earshot.

[⛓️ COUNTERS]
- Gold buys pauses not safety, misnaming or counter‑rites stall a called name, and borders or jurisdictions can end the rider’s claim.

[✨] FOIL_PATTERN: Gunmetal holo with flowing smoke that curls into letters.
